name: THE RED CUBE (bintin)
description:
FIND THE RED CUBE BEFORE HE GETS MAD AND TRY TO ESCAPE.

WHEN THE CLOCK RINGS, FIND IT.

CONTROLS:

RIGHT CLICK: OPEN DOOR, SEE PAGE, INTERACT.

F: ON/OFF TORCH.

SOUNDS AND MUSIC FROM: WWW.ZAPSPLAT.COM

STATIC EFFECT: VECTEEZY.COM

WARNING, THE GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS.

___________________________________________________________________

G-Y-B-O-R
